content.detailedDescription: Above description applies.
content.summary: What appeared to be several white lights spontaneously flashing but when lights faded you could make out a solid craft the lights were on. it maintained a what appeared to be an intended direction.

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from movies  saw orange light moving slow in the sky ,pulled over got out of car and watched it burnout
content.summary: Long orange fireball moving slow across sky thought it was a plane on fire at first but watched it go dim

content.detailedDescription: Watching in my back yard an ufo that has whit flashing lights under it. red and green on top. seems to be hovering over robstown.
content.summary: Watching what looks like a star, moving up and down for about 30 min. still observing.

content.detailedDescription: Round, glowing ball of reddish-orange with a halo around that traveled in a southeasterly to northwesterly direction. it did not pulsate its colors but had a halo of light around it. it stayed at the same elevation of around 3000 feet and flew its course at a very rapid speed. we watched it until it disappeared in the distance.
content.summary: Round, glowing ball of fire around 3000 ft in elevation

content.detailedDescription: We were all out in front of the cherry bar on cherry smoking and we saw this red shiny glowing but perfectly outlined cigar shaped thing in the sky not moving but blinking and not doing anything then it darted to one side then moved what looked like downward then darted to another direction then it totally vanished like the red was all gone and we all stood there looking and it reappeared in a different part of the sky further down the street then just took off right and then stopped and hovered then took off right again until we wouldn't see it anymore because of the buildings and trees and stuff we all tried to  get it on our cell phones and even people that were walking a dog stopped and watched it with us for a while and pointed at it and talked about it in spanish and tried to take pics and vids of it too but because of the street lights and stuff no one could get a good shot of it because of the lights and distance it was crazy we were all spooked
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: We were all out smoking infront of a bar on the street and saw something moving

content.detailedDescription: Was watching the night sky while smoking a cigarette, i live in the flight path of the charlotte douglas intl airport, and watched a plane ascent and above the plane was a small light, traveling in an eastern path before disappearing near the constellation of the northern crown, the light was way above the aircraft.
content.summary: Light traveling in the night sky before disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on pelham rd. from my workplace at the haywood mall. i looked toward paris mountain and noticed some orange lights in the sky. at first sight i thought they were the lighted radio towers on the mountain, but then i realized that they were too high in the sky. i looked more closely and noticed that there were actually two rows of these lights flying in a v-pattern (with the bottom of the "v" pointed toward paris mountain). the lights that were further away appeared to be less bright. i kept driving and the trees blocked my view, so i drove very quickly to the median on pelham in front of bruster's (i wanted to stop driving so i could watch them). at this point i noticed the lights that were closest to me were swooping, diving, rising, and chasing after each other (just like they do in amateur video footage). then these lights basically faded away. they just vanished. i drove to the bruster's parking lot, but by the time i got there, they were completely gone.
content.summary: Several orange lights flying in a v-pattern, with some chasing each other

content.detailedDescription: In the night sky on a clear night, with visible stars, saw a red orb, thought it was a helicopter. but it had no flashing lights, then it moved. then it disappeared, then reappeared in a different location. it was about the altitude of a helicopter, no sound.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright red light. at first thought it was a helicopter but it had no flashing lights and did not move. then disappeared, then came back and moved.

content.detailedDescription: I was alone in the backyard, with a small cooking fire in a pit, going to embers. i was looking in the sky hoping to see bats in the fading twilight. i noticed a red glow at what appeared to be a high altitude that was moving due north at a moderate speed. assuming that the altitude was as high as it seemed, the speed was consistent with a conventional jet aircraft. the character of the light was nothing like any aircraft i have ever seen. it was a red hazy ball of light with a yellow/white light that seemed to be at the lower extremity of the ball, and which was flickering at an inconsistent pace. the yellow/white light almost appeared like a flame, but the red hazy ball did not seem to vary in it's appearance. as the object traversed the sky it changed course and speed slightly. when i first noticed it, it had just come into view from the obstruction of a large tree. i realized that i had my camera with me, and quickly switched it to video mode. my camera is an olympus fe230. i had nothing to steady the camera against, but some of the footage is pretty still. i also tried to get some trees in the view while zoomed out, but it was almost too dark to capture them. i called for my wife to come out to see, but she was in the bathroom and was unable to come out until it had faded into the north sky. in the footage, i saw two light dots that seem to move in and out corresponding with zooming the camera in and out. i feel that those two dots were caused by the lens, as they remain stable in relation to the frame. i was quite excited to see this phenomenon. the object gradually faded from view in the distance. i am a pilot and am very knowledgeable about aircraft and atmospheric phenomenon, and this sighting was unexplainable to me. i would also like to point out that the sky was perfectly clear. there were a few stars just starting to appear, and they were sharply defined.
content.summary: Red glow with randomly flickering yellow/white light

content.detailedDescription: This a old sighting i remember from my childhood 04/15/73 glenolden pa. large brownish gray craft in the sky wittnessed by many it was on or about april 15th 1973 i remember because it was right before easter i was 10 yrs old at the time. i was traveling in the family station wagon with my mother and 12 year old sister. we were headed home from shopping traveling south on south ave in the small town of glenolden pa. as we approached the area of the macdade mall ( this is the same mall that was used in the to film the movie the lovely bones ) we could see the traffic was stopped up a head. then we noticed that people were out of their cars looking up at the sky.As we looked up there was a giant craft of some kind, i mean this thing was huge as big as the mall and the parking lot all put together. there were a few white lights on the center of the under side and the craft made no sound at all. it just seemed to hoover there in the sky.The craft was a cigar shape brownist gray in color. there were many witnesses to this event. we watched it for about five minutes then continued home. after arriving we called our local radio station to report what we had saw, they were receiving many reports of the same object in the sky.That night it was all over the local news. and by the next day it seemed, it was completley forgotten about and never mentioned again, there was no explanation ever given for what we saw in the sky that night. to this day my sister and i wonder what it was that we saw. the date of the incident is approximate.
content.summary: The craft was a cigar shape brownist gray in color it was huge & made no sound

content.detailedDescription: I live in essington pa about a mile or two from philadelphia i was just getting home from work i guess a little after 1am as i exited my vehicle in front of my house i noticed four bright orbs of light spinning around an even brighter light that was in the center they would go around the center light and then all four lights would go into the center light and break away repeating the same patteren over and over again. i ran into the house woke up my step son and we went back out front and tried to record it and take a few pictures do to the bright street lights and the lights of the near by city of philadelphia we were unable to get any pictures or footage of the lights. what ever it was it was huge it was an over cast night and the lights were above the cloud cover i would estamate it being 400 to 600 feet in diameter
content.summary: Four bright orbs of light spinning around an even brighter light that was in the center they would go around the center light and then all four lights would go into the center light and break away repeating the same patteren over and over again.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Possible the same event as 38245. a yellow/orange star/planet-like object descended in a star like path from the southeast to east in the sky but traveled faster than one would normally. it appear during dinner time, we were outside eating when we noticed it, binoculars confirmed the color and shape, when trying to set up the telescope it had already gone below the tree line a few minutes later. i thought i might have been venus but it near the sun right now, saturn was in the vicinity but it doesn't move that fast.
content.summary: Yellow/orange star-like object sped though the sky

content.detailedDescription: Out the corner of my eye i saw an orange orb moving slowly across the sky above a neighbours house. viewed for apx 30 secs til i was able to activate my mobile phone camera. the object seemed to move slowly from side to side but stay headed roughly in the same general directon. it appeared to be a constant brightness and did not fluctuate or change appearance like a flare would. there was no sound and it was definately not something you see in the sky on an everyday basis such as an aeroplane or helicopter as flashing lights are required by law. it was definately not a star or celestial object as it was too close. it was travelling far too slowly to be a meteor of other piece of space debris. it actually appeared to be increasing in altitude as it got further away, but i am certain it's altitude did not decrease. a very interesting sighting indeed!
content.summary: Orange orb moving slowly in the evening sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down miller road westbound in swartz creek bringing my girlfriend back home from mcdonald's. as we were leaving mcdonald's we noticed several emergency vehicles driving by at a rather rapid rate of speed. when we got closer to her house we were rubber necking at the cops and emts to see what was going on. we drove past the house that they were at past the rite aid parking lot when i looked back at the road and there was a craft above the road. i noticed that it was close to the ground for an airplane or helicopter so i was joking around and said, " oh look a ufo". that's when i noticed it had a weird shape for an airplane or helicopter it was shaped some what like a curved rectangle similar to a tel-per ware bowl. it had lights on the side of it with two columns of three yellow lights and then a third column with only the center light. it also had blinking orange light that appeared about every 5 seconds. at first i thought this couldn't be happening , i live by an airport and i see airplanes and helicopters come in all the time so that's what i initially thought it was until i saw how slow it was moving. i pulled over on the shoulder of the road, turned off the radio, and then rolled down my windows and me and my girlfriend heard no sounds. the craft was making no sounds and the usual night time sounds of frogs and crickets was silent as well. after we didn't hear anything we started to get very freaked out watching the craft move south to north. then the craft stopped and was hovering somewhere off to the north of miller road. we were already pretty frightened at that point when it started moving in the eastward direction. after that a car was driving up behind us and i decided to drive away. as i drove away i could see the craft continue it's eastward journey as i turned one last time. we were both legitimately scared at that point and didn't want to see what else happened. i drove her back to her house as we went over what we had both seen. i was very scared driving back home and i didn't know what to do thinking i might see it again but by the time i got back to miller road it was already gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Disc/rectangle like ufo in swartz creek, mi

content.detailedDescription:
Detailed description of the ufo event:
my wife and i love to hike and look up at the sky.Almost every night for the 
pass three years when i am going to bed i will look out our back door and just 
enjoy the stars.I had read on the internet where mercury or mars was suppose to 
be getting to cross paths with venus.The night was clear and the stars where out 
and almost as soon as i started looking up i noticed right away in the western 
sky one white star like luminous object that seemed to be venting or sparking 
from the bottom(almost like a tail)and to the right of that was a red orb that 
looked like a red core with a pulsating ring around it(about a mile away. )i did 
not see a metal craft.I do live by the airport and i know it was not a plane.I 
know it was not a start because after 30 minutes they would have moved in the 
sky but these stood still.I went to wake my wife up and they where gone.The 
feeling i got was not one of dread but hay we are just watching you all and 
relax.
content.summary: Two very bright lights in the sky .One was white  a shined like a star but appeared to have a tail.The other red glowing orb with  a pulse of red around it.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside on farris road another witness and i observed a dim "star" travel from directly above us due north at least five times faster than a normal airplane if not faster. upon seeing this i stepped off the front steps into the yard to get a better view of the sky and immediately saw an identical object directly above us traveling due east at roughly the same speed as the first one. within a minute i saw another identical object directly above me traveling due north again at the same speed as the other two. the other witness had walked inside and did not see the third object. the sky was completely clear. i stayed outside long enough to see a bird, a bat, a lightning bug, and another flying insect to see if a light reflection on some kind of flying insect or animal may look the same. this was not an animal, a star, or any conventional aircraft. the sightings were seconds long, the dim, almost gray, single light did not blink or pulsate and did not have any accompanying red light like an airplane. it traveled maybe ten times faster than a helicopter and appeared to be below the rest of the stars. i first noticed the object because i noticed movement out of the corner of my eye and then directed my view towards it. at first i thought it must be a plane but as i had been seeing planes fly over for about an hour, i knew it was traveling much too fast to be any plane and had no blinking lights whatsoever. the light appeared bigger than the lights on a plane. i felt like it was a fluke that i happened to be outside looking at the exact moment these objects flew over. i did not experience anything emotionally except amazement. at first i thought it might be some type of experimental plane but decided there would have to be three in order to appear as it did or the same one disappeared and reappeared within seconds almost at the same spot and then fly off. all three objects just disappeared out of sight. with the first object, i noticed something odd with the dark sky-like some type of optical illusion. it made me wonder if the object was indeed much bigger in size and perhaps transparent or cloaked making the sky around it appear fuzzy or warped.
content.summary: Another witness and i observed two dim star-like objects travel extremely fast across clear sky.

content.detailedDescription: I as running on the track in montgomery county, maryland at around 11:30pm on 5/18/2012.  i noticed a bright yellow light off in the distance, flying from my right to my left in a circular path.  soon after i noticed the first light, a second, slightly dimmer, pulsating red light appeared from way above to the top and right, and descended on an intercept path (45 degree angle), behind the yellow light.  it was flying far behind the yellow one and slight got closer and closer until it looked like it was 1 inch behind the other.  then it kept following the other yellow one until they were both out of my vision through the trees.  by this time, though 15 minutes must've passed since i first saw them and i literally had to turn around 360 degrees on the track to keep sight of the path.  it went from my right all the way around... it was really bizarre cause i never saw anything like that.
content.summary: Yellow light flying straight path.  red dimmer light descending on intercept path, following yellow light.

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were on our way to a nearby mall to do our weekly groceries. while waiting for a jeepney, i looked up at the sky, remembering another ufo that my mother witnessed last month (april 9) on the exact same spot, and hoping to see it too. (we saw multiple ufos on april 10, including what appeared to be fleets of white orbs moving westward).

anyway, on april 9, my mother saw what she described as a transparent oblong with what appeared to be four legs with bright black balls at the ends. the entire object seemed to be rolling across the sky, moving from south to north, up in the sky along the exact middle of the main highway.

at around 12:30 noon today (may 19), while waiting for a jeepney, i quickly scanned the skies and saw floating over the gas station across the street what i first thought was a black kite. it was moving in a waving, rippling motion, much like a snake. it was large because it was obviously very high up because it appeared to sometimes go above the clouds, and yet i could see it clearly and it probably measured about an inch if i held my fingers before my face against the sky. i pointed it out to my mother and we observed the object for a few minutes. we noted that it did not have a main head or body, like a kite has. it appeared exactly like a snake, except that when we observed it closely, we noticed that it actually appeared to be like some type of black plasma that seemed to be expanding and retracting at different points along its "body." it was jet-black and had no discernible lights.

a few minutes later, my mother suddenly exclaimed, "dalawa sila!" (there's two of them!) and sure enough, some distance to its right was another object of the exact same type, also jet-black and also writhing and undulating like a snake. this one was much larger and we could clearly see that it was not a kite or a balloon or a piece of cloth. like i said, it appeared to me to be a stream of some sort of jet-black plasma that was undulating in the air. it sometimes also flashed in the sun like something silver and metallic, and my mother thought she saw a light suddenly flash at one end of it, but i did not see this as i was looking at the other object when this happened.

i tried to take photos and videos of the two objects with my cell phone camera, but my camera is an old model and was not able to capture the objects. 

some time later (maybe around 15 minutes), i suddenly noticed that there was another object that had come up between the first two. it looked exactly the same and moved in the exact same way. the first two on the left would sometimes roll up into themselves and descend or ascend. the one on the right, the large one, would hover for long moments (around five to ten minutes at a time) as just a straight, rigid black line, without moving or fluttering in the wind. then it would start to undulate again. it would cycle between this pattern of hovering and not moving and remaining rigid, and undulating and writhing, throughout the almost two hours we were standing there at the jeepney stop.

all this time, we were both crying out and pointing at the sky but none of the people nearby bothered to look, which we both found strange. anyway, apart from a group of men who were working on some sort of electrical repair out in front of their shop, there were very few people out because it was very hot and most people were having lunch, i guess. 

some time later, another object appeared, in the same general area, making it a total of four black snakelike objects writing and hovering in the sky. some time past one, i suddenly noticed what appeared to be a blurred pink or red light farther off to our right. as we looked, it slowly "unfurled" and also became snakelike, also alternating between being straight and rigid and undulating. i also noticed that it was accompanied by what appeared to be a black orb that was circling it at first and then moving beside it and suddenly veering off to the left and disappearing.

when i moved my gaze back to the black "snakes" to the left, only two remained, and suddenly i noticed that there was an object to the left of the largest snake. it was aligned perfectly with the straight line formed by the black object. it appeared to me to be a small triangular object that emitted a pink light. when i first noticed it, it was hovering along with the black snake, but then it started moving in different directions. it was not fluttering like a kite or wobbling like a balloon. it was moving slowly in deliberate motions. suddenly, it seemed to plunge downward. as it did, it became what seemed to be a silvery disk, and as it plunged further down, it suddenly became larger and became a large, deep black circle with a hole or light in the middle. when it reached a certain altitude, where i could see it right over the rooftops, it moved slowly to the right and suddenly moved up again and become again what seemed like a triangular pink star, or rather, three pink stars connected to each other to form a triangle. we watched this object move and plunge down and up again repeatedly, until we both realized that we were shaking with hunger. 

around 2:15, we hesitantly left our spot to buy food at a nearby convenience store. when we returned, the black snakelike thing was gone and only the pink triangle remained, it still kept plunging and seemingly changing shape and then ascending again. we watched this for around 15 to 20 minutes more but my mother insisted that we need to get going. i very reluctantly agreed because we did need to get back home early. 
we boarded a jeepney and i briefly saw the object again when we passed by an open space between buildings. it was nearer here and i could clearly see that it was three circular objects that were joined together to form a triangle, and it was rolling and falling and moving sideways and just seemingly dancing up there in the sky. it was amazing. i still could not believe we saw all that today. i have to admit i thought instantly of quetzalcoatl when we saw those sky "serpents," whatever they were. i tried to look it up online when we got home but apart from a couple of reports, i could not find anything similar to what we witnessed today.
content.summary: Sighting of four black snakelike objects and one red snakelike object accompanied by what seemed to be shapeshifting craft and orbs

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on couch, when my wife went in the backyard with the dog , then she started yelling at me to get out here and look at this!! right above our fence line was over 100 small blinking lights all moving the same direction , they seemed to be scattered around ,but all together. it appeared that they were traveling about 60 mph all in the same direction. in the middle of the cluster was a hugh triangle but its lights did not blink. towards the end of the pack was another small trianle, they all passed by then they were gone. i then called my friend in phenix city and told him to go outside and look up that they were heading his way he then reported that he never saw anything but a couple of jets taking off from fort benning. we looked back up and there was one by itself kind of way behind the pack, and he was traveling the same direction as well.
content.summary: Over 100 lights all flying same direction one hugh triangle in middle and one small in back.

content.detailedDescription: A buddy and i decided to gaze at the stars after explaining my last encounter with ufo's. we got out the back door and looked for an area to lay down and gaze. my buddy started pissing on my house. i was looking for blankets on the cloths line and all of a sudden a weird honking type sound came from the sky. assuming it was a bird of some sort, i look up to see what it was. my buddy unfortunately looked in the opposite direction as me but yet still heard the same sound i heard. as i was scanning the sky for a big loud bird of some sort, a dim light caught my eye. heading to the north, was a diagonal row of dim lights heading at a quick and constant speed. the row of lights seemed to appear like half an isosceles triangle heading off in a hurry without a sound. it seemed as tho whatever it was, was spooked and make a honk like sound and hurried away. when i first saw this row of objects, i thought it was a shooting star. as soon as i saw the row of lights, i was rather frightened and hurried inside for about 30 seconds or so. my buddy finally got done emptying out on my house and was rather curious what he had heard and what i had seen. i seemed to lose sight of this object in the same place where the light dimmed out the stars. not more than 45 seconds later, my buddy and i heard the same honking type sound in a different location, then about 5 seconds later, we heard this again in a totally different direction and louder. it seemed as tho this thing was on the move all around us. some of its sound was louder and some was quieter as if it was far away. later we never heard it again. in the audio recording which i hope works has dogs barking in the very beginning and right after the bark, the sound comes in rather faint but not hard to miss. that's my story! :)
content.summary: Row of lights takes off imediately after a distinct whirl/honking sound

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home, turned on my street when i saw a bright torquoise orb hovering, not pulsating.  then it started to pulsate rapidly, then would get really bright, dim out. no pattern to it. still stationary, a red light started flying to it. went right under and when slightly to the left, heard pop and then the torquoise orb started flying ash.  the torquoise orb had hexagon al type patterns or scales.When looking through binoculars. slight foggy aura around. the light just flew into the distance auburn, ca
content.summary: Bright torquoise orb  and red light auburn, ca

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen the black triangle personally twice in my lifetime. both times where located within the same county (wa state). my most recent sighting is the one where i witnessed it fly 25 yards directly above my head. this account happened august, 2010. i was driving on a back road going to a buddies house (which is 1/2 mile from the canadian border) when i saw it moving northeast from the southwest direction. it was moving around 10-15 mph. i witnessed it around 9:15 pm, so it was dark with mild cloud coverage. it was making no noise and had no lighting at first. from corner to corner i would compare the size to a 3 1/2 lane road, so it was a fairly large. i witnessed the outline from a distance and eventually when it flew directly above me i saw some solid outlines on it. i saw no windows, in turn didn't see if anyone was operating inside. i noticed all three corners of the vehicle had 3 lights with a diameter of 1 foot. one light was in the middle with a diameter of 2 feet. these lights didn't turn on until the vehicle became very close to the border, the only reason i noticed them in the first place was because of the light reflection they were giving. 

it seemed to have 2 tiers in height, a smaller at the bottom, with a larger on top. the material also seemed to have a micro stone texture with a glossy smudge effect colored in black. as it became half the distance from me and the canadian border, lights turned on to mimic that of a helicopter and sounds were created to also mimic a propelling sound. it eventually disappeared from distance. i tried to pull out my evo 4g phone to take pictures, but the quality was so bad with pitch blackness while above me that i had to scrap them. no drugs or alcohol were involved with my personal sighting.
content.summary: Most recent black triangle ufo, whatcom county

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting occured today, may 18th 2012, 21h57. i have spent all evening in my backyard working on my company truck. i decided that it was all for today so i shut all of my outdoor lights. there was no neighbor outside and their exterior lights were also all shut. 

i went to the far end of my backyard and sat down on a chair, alone, relaxing and looking at the sky. a few minutes before the sighting, i spotted the usual planes and one possible satellite. 

my eyes were rapidly scanning the sky when something caught the corner of my eye. a "star" was traveling very fast across the sky, from west to east. as soon as i spotted the object, i tried to focus on it and follow it with my eyes : i was completely mind blown. there was a total of three star-like objects moving fast in a linear formation! they were surrounded by a very faint white disk-shaped halo. what happened after that just blew my mind: the objects steered to form a triangular formation. they regained their initial linear formation after about two seconds and i lost sight of the formation in the horizon. they made no noise, no blinking lights or no strobes. it was just like that: stars travelling at enormous speed.

i got chills immediately afterwards, i knew that what i just saw was not of this earth. i've never seen anything like that before.
content.summary: 3 star-like objects traveling fast in a linear formation then shifting to triangular formation

content.detailedDescription: Star like object traveling among the stars. traveling from south to north across sky at high rate of speed them changed directions towards the east until it was out of sight.
content.summary: Star like object traveling among the stars. traveling across sky at high rate of speed them changed directions until it was out of sight.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Sorry, i accidentally submitted the wrong date for it the first time!!  i'm just going to copy and paste what i said before.

my mom and i had gotten off the bus from church and started walking down the hill to our house. i looked up into the sky, and noticed a large, red, glowing circle slowly moving to the left. i told my mom and we stood there to watch it for about 30 seconds. then i said, "oh my gosh i need to take a picture!". when i reached down to grab my phone, there was a huge flash that made me jump, and the large red glow of the 'star' disappeared. but, then 'star' continued to move slowly to the left until i lost track of it. then we continued walking down the hill, and still freaked out, i kept looking at the sky. i then noticed a large white ball, the same size as the red, in the sky moving to the left. i was only able to look at it for about 5 seconds because the bright light suddenly died out and turned into a normal looking 'star' and continued moving left, 2 seconds later completely dying out. after that we didn't see anything else. when i first noticed the object, i thought it was a comet or something. it made me feel excited, happy, or in aw because i've always wanted to see something like that, and it was so large. i lost sight of the object because i was looking around for other moving 'stars' in the sky. (i'm including an image i drew out in paint of the size of the object compared to the surrounding stars, and an arrow to show the direction it moved from where we were standing).
content.summary: Two large bright lights, one red, one white, hover across sky and disappear

content.detailedDescription:
My mom and i had gotten off the bus from church and started walking down the hill to our house.  i looked up into the sky, and noticed a large, red, glowing circle slowly moving to the left.  i told my mom and we stood there to watch it for about 30 seconds.  then i said, "oh my gosh i need to take a picture!".  when i reached down to grab my phone, there was a huge flash that made me jump, and the large red glow of the 'star' disappeared.  but, then 'star' continued to move slowly to the left until i lost track of it.  then we continued walking down the hill, and still freaked out, i kept looking at the sky.  i then noticed a large white ball, the same size as the red, in the sky moving to the left.  i was only able to look at it for about 5 seconds because the bright light suddenly died out and turned into a normal looking 'star' and continued moving left, 2 seconds later completely dying out.  after that we didn't see anything else.

when i first noticed the object, i thought it was a comet or something.
it made me feel excited, happy, or in aw because i've always wanted to see something like that, and it was so large.

i lost sight of the object because i was looking around for other moving 'stars' in the sky.

(i'm including an image i drew out in paint of the size of the object compared to the surrounding stars, and an arrow to show the direction it moved from where we were standing)
content.summary: Two large bright lights, one red, one white, hover across sky and disappear

content.detailedDescription: Was going out to get something from car noticed 2 orange light in the eastern sky i was high and to the left the other low and to the right. both moving same speed up. i went to my car to got my camera and when i came back 30 sec. they were both gone. about 10 sec later 2 more appeared and i started filming. i was able to capture one more set on my camera before i ran out of room on disc. after i stopped filming 2 more sets went buy. all together about 15 minuits
content.summary: Red orb in eastern sky from columbus ohio

content.detailedDescription: I am sending photos showing something unidentified that i noticed years after the photos were taken. i did not notice anything at the time the pictures were taken, only years later while browsing them. image-0107 shows something in the sky just above the mountain skyline. image-0102 shows what could be the same object in the clearing between the trees way above the date stamp. image-0105 is just for site identification. my female friend was with me when these photos were taken. i have more photos of the area but not cantaining anything unknown.
content.summary: Unknown object noticed in digital pictures years after they were taken.

content.detailedDescription: my cousin had come over to hang out and when he was leaving he pointed to the sky and it was only for 10 seconds or less and i saw it move straight across the sky. when i looked it stopped for about 2 seconds the took off in the north direction of the sky. it looked like it was heading straight for a planet.
content.summary: It was fast small and in a straight path

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on the balcony with my wife, we looked up to see a black helicopter. the helicopter was circling the area between 17th avenue 4th st and 15th avenue 2nd st.
i looked at it and commented "that copter is looking for something, he's circling. what's he up to?"
my wife then pointed to the center point of the helicopters circled area. she said "look at that."
the ufo appeared solid black and looked like a slightly bent cigar. it was very close to the helicopter, slightly to the west of it.
the helicopter continued to circle and the ufo began changing shape into a circle. first it turned into an egg shape then a circle.
after hovering for a few moments it appeared to drift about in a localized area. then, it began traveling at a regular speed east.
i thought it was coming down but then it started to get a little smaller and looked to be traveling upward. it was traveling only slightly lower than cloud cover.
there was a thin ring around it like an aura and to me the sky seemed slightly electric.
we lost sight of it as it traveled behind a building. we continued looked to where it's trajectory would have it appear but it never did.
the helicopter moved to where the ufo had traveled and began circling that area. it looked like the helicopter was waiting for it to return or re-emerge.
we watched the sky for some time after that, the helicopter circled the area for several minutes then headed north.
content.summary: Black oval/cigar ufo over downtown calgary. appeared from clouds on 4th st and traveled east
